channel.title: Wikipedia Problem on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Wikipedia Problem on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: A Screwy Straw Stat
item.description: As you may or may not know, I often speak up against the way that sometimes, a “fact” will show up on Wikipedia, unchallenged, for years, only to stumble into books large and small over the next number of years, something I call “The Windex Problem.” But what if the data point is something being shared not by an encyclopedia, but by a number of nonprofits looking to make the case for a bigger mission?
